CCDD

Class CcddUndoHandler.TextFieldEdit

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.undo.AbstractUndoableEdit
      • CCDD.CcddUndoHandler.TextFieldEdit
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, javax.swing.undo.UndoableEdit
    Enclosing class:
    CcddUndoHandler

    private class CcddUndoHandler.TextFieldEdit
extends javax.swing.undo.AbstractUndoableEdit
    Text field edit event handler class. If the data field handler is set then the undo/redo operation compares the text field's name to the data field owner and field names to determine if these match, and if so the text field specified in the data field information is the one on which the undo/redo operation is performed

      • TextFieldEdit

        TextFieldEdit(CcddUndoHandler.UndoableTextField textField,
              java.lang.String oldValue,
              java.lang.String newValue,
              java.lang.String fieldOwner,
              java.lang.String fieldName)
        Text field edit event handler constructor
        Parameters:
        textField - reference to the text field being edited
        oldValue - previous text field value
        newValue - new text field value
        fieldOwner - owner of the data field to which the text field belongs; null if the text field is not a data field
        fieldName - name of the data field to which the text field belongs; null if the text field is not a data field

      • setSelectedTextField

        private void setSelectedTextField(java.lang.String value)
        Set the selected text field. In order for this to select the text field it must be scheduled to execute after other pending events
        Parameters:
